input.sentences: we managed to bike way out here | into the middle of nowhere .
and it was such a beautiful and fun trip .
the only sign of civilization were those antennas .
what a view from up here !
and of course the ride down is always more fun !
output.sentences: It seemed strange to travel the bike trail alone.
The area was the same as it was so many months ago.
As she traveled nearer to the hill top of the trail she paused.
She parked her bike and looked over the hilltop and remembered how he loved it here.
As looked back down the bike trail she knew that without him life would as bumpy as the trail.
